Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory95.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Evan! Get back here!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "He likely didn't catch you. Human hearing isn't as good as Constructs. Besides, he's probably in the forest by now.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's go look for him.", 3: '12'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Yeah, a child can't possibly outrun a Construct.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory95.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Hey! Stop! What are you doing!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "What are you planning on doing at the Forest Guard's settlement?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did you see a child go by?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: 'A child? What child?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll take that as a no.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "I don't know what you're going on about. All I know is that you have not stated your purpose for coming here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're looking for the Forest Guards. Staessen wants them to return to the banquet.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: '...Why does Staessen need the Forest Guards?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The guard looks at you and picks up the radio receiver skeptically, but his harpoon still remains firmly pointed at you.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Lighthouse, Lighthouse. This is Northwest #3. Please put the captain online.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Yes, it's me. I heard these Babylonians say...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Alright, understood.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The guard puts down the radio, and places his harpoon on the pile of firewood.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "Get going. Staessen's cool with it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'But stay alert. Bionic numbers may be thinning, but they are still wandering around out there.', 4: '1'}
